alert.note: Alert for Fayette; Lamar; Walker (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 16 at 12:52AM CST until January 16 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST TODAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 AM CST EARLY THIS MORNING... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, mixed precipitation. Additional snow and sleet accumulations less than one-half inch and ice accumulations up to one tenth of an inch. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 5 below zero. * WHERE...Lamar, Fayette and Walker Counties. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 3 AM CST early this morning. For the Wind Chill Advisory, until noon CST today. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. The cold wind chills could result in hypothermia if precautions are not taken.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.
